document_data.name: Thorass
document_data.mainbody: The '''Thorass languages''' composed a large linguistic grouping of languages spoken throughout [[Faerûn]],<ref name=D:SiT-p28>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}} including [[Thorass language|Thorass]], [[Chondathan language|Chondathan]], and [[Common]].<ref name=FRCS-85>
document_data.Subgroups:
The Thorass language group was broken down by scholars into five subgroups:<ref name=D:SiT-p28/>
* [[Central Thorass languages]]
* [[North Thorass languages]]
* [[East Thorass languages]]
* [[Turmic]]
* [[Aglarondan language|Aglarondan]]
document_data.Script: Thorass languages shared the same script, with only a few exceptions.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], the Thorass group was the most active language group in [[Faerûn]].
